info.title: Denner Web Service
info.description: RESTful API for Denner's commercial consumers

get.description:
Use this operation to get a list of all articles (excluded tobacco) promoted today and advertised in the online-mobile channels.

Warning: result is approximately 1MB in size, this webpage javascript will suffer high performance degradation on response beautification.

region.value: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich

store.value: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich
Disponible(s) uniquement dans les succursales aves des produits frais

fits_with.value: Pasta, carni accompagnate da salse aromatiche

character.value: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.
Robe rubis foncé. Nez de baies rouges, de cerises matures et de mûres. Bouche moelleuse.
Rosso rubino scuro. Al naso aromi di bacche rosse, ciliege mature e more. Morbido al palato.

get.summary: List all online articles having tobacco article group (not listed otherwise)
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all tobacco articles promoted today and advertised in the online-mobile channels.
Use this operation to get a list of all stores (Filialen) open today.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online publications (usually filtered by a specific channel and timeframe).

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:
- [{"property":"id","operator":"in","type":"array","value":["7627150d-36bd-4867-89b2-091800a03d24","58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8"]}]
- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]
- [{"property":"channels","value":"vf-banner"},{"property":"week","value":12},{"property":"year","value":2023}]

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Sort object, urlencoded.

Sort object:
- property: Property to sort on.
- direction: (optional) Sort direction property. Enumeration ('asc', 'desc').

Examples:
- [{"property":"sort_index","direction":"asc"}]
- [{"property":"year"},{"property":"week","direction":"asc"}]

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

get.summary: Get single online publication (includes all advertised articles)
get.description: Use this operation to get a single publication targeted at online channels, e.g. denner.ch or the Mobile App (Online-Werbemittel). The response will include the articles assigned to this publication.

parameters.name: publication_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online publication

promotion_info.value: Aktionspreise für Einzelflaschen nur in der jeweiligen Aktionswoche gültig
Les prix promotionnels sur les bouteilles vendues à la pièce ne sont valables que durant la semaine d’action
I prezzi promozionali delle singole bottiglie sono validi solo nella rispettiva settimana promozionale

region.value: Nur in der deutschen und französischen Schweiz erhältlich
Disponible uniquement en Suisse alémanique et romande
Disponibile solo nella Svizzera tedesca e romanda

store.value: Nur in Filialen mit Frischprodukten erhältlich, ohne Denner Satelliten / Denner Express
Disponible uniquement dans les succursales avec des produits frais, satellites Denner et Denner Express exclus
Disponibile solo nelle filiali con prodotti freschi, exclusi i satelliti Denner e i Denner Express

title.value: Bevande da tavola e acque minerali

fits_with.value: Pasta, carni accompagnate da salse aromatiche

character.value: Dunkles Rubinrot. In der Nase Aromen von roten Beeren, reifen Kirschen und Brombeeren. Geschmeidig im Gaumen.
Robe rubis foncé. Nez de baies rouges, de cerises matures et de mûres. Bouche moelleuse.
Rosso rubino scuro. Al naso aromi di bacche rosse, ciliege mature e more. Morbido al palato.

get.summary: List all online articles for newsletter
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online articles promoted in the given week in the newsletter channels.

parameters.name: week
parameters.description: Year followed by the week number (ISO 8601, week date system) PHP date format 'o-W' (ref: https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.format.php)

get.summary: Fetch online publication with articles for banner
get.description: Use this operation fetch an online publication with articles to be displayed in banner.

parameters.name: publication_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an online publication

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online groups (Internet-Sortimente).

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online filters (Angebotsfilter; e.g. "Aktionen aktuelle Woche" or "Aktionen der Folgewoche").

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

title.value: Hits de la semaine en cours

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all stores (Filialen).

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all online specials (Raritäten).

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all store channels (Filialkanäle; e.g. "Denner" or "Denner Satellit").

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all store services (Filialangebote; e.g. "Humidor" or "Backstation").

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The page size that might be unlimited. Default: -1 (no limit)

title.value: Frutta e verdura in vendita sfusa

Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:

- [{"property":"channels","value":"vf-banner"},{"property":"week","value":12},{"property":"year","value":2023}]

- direction: (optional) Sort direction property. Enumeration ('asc', 'desc').

get.description: Use this operation to fetch the first display-publication for a specific screen, layout and language to display on current day.

parameters.name: display-on
parameters.description:
Any valid date string that can be parsed by [php strtotime](https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strtotime.php).
Examples:
 - 2023-01-10
 - today
 - tomorrow
 - next Thursday
 - last Monday

Default when not set 'today'.

get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all articles serialized for XPT.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:
- [{"property":"id","operator":"in","type":"array","value":["7627150d-36bd-4867-89b2-091800a03d24","58afec5c-ece9-4b66-bc55-00d6dc1b65b8"]}]
- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]
- [{"property":"channels","value":"vf-banner"},{"property":"week","value":12},{"property":"year","value":2023}]

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Filters: JSON array of Sort object, urlencoded.

Sort object:
- property: Property to sort on.
- direction: (optional) Sort direction property. Enumeration ('asc', 'desc').

Examples:

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
The page size. Default: 10
To disable pagination (when supported) send "-1".

get.summary: List advertised articles by week for XPT
get.description: Use this operation to get a list of all advertised-articles of a specific week serialized for XPT.

parameters.name: year_week
parameters.description: Year followed by the week number (ISO 8601, week date system) PHP date format 'o-W' (ref: https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.format.php)

post.description: Crate an A4 base poster (for pre-printed paper) from article.

CdnUrl.description:
Image provided through the [ImgIX](https://imgix.com) CDN, query parameters can be appended to apply rendering effects.
Follow instructions in the [ImgIX rendering API](https://docs.imgix.com/apis/rendering) reference.
Every image (included query params) is cached for performance (main task of a CDN), if an image is changed its cache is purged.

Cooling.description: Cooling type (0 = no cooling, 1 = refrigerated, 2 = frozen)

LegalWarning.description: Indicates which legal warning info **must** be displayed.

LegalTexts.description:
Mandatory text to display with article. 
**Must occupy at least 10% of article advertising area.**
Texts are chained with the legal warning.

Validity.description: Generic validity based on dates (from/to) and a corresponding text

ArticleValidity.description: Article validity based on dates (from/to) and corresponding texts (short and long version)

AvailabilityLimitations.description: Texts for information about limited availability

name.description: German name for the eco label

id.description: View ID that is represented in packshot

type.description: Mime type for the output image

url.description: Image url which can be used, for example, in an 'img' tag

value.description: Navision stock count, might be negative
Barcode text value (pattern according to type)

RatingStars.description: Stars, rounded to the half integer

OnlinePublicationDisplay.description: Period of display (from/to), calculated value based on online filters

featured.description: Is it a featured article (should be displayed on the front/main/home page)?

promoted.description: Is it a promoted article (should be displayed with full information)?

compared.description: Is the article's price compared to an offer from an other company?

filters.description: Online filter with appearances (and no localised title)

allow_featuring.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be featured (i.e. displayed on front/main/home page)?

allow_promotion.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be promoted (i.e. displayed on a promotional page)?

allow_background.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be displayed with a background (i.e. displayed on a page with a deceptive/trivializing background)?

allow_featuring.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be featured (i.e. displayed on front/main/home page)?

allow_promotion.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be promoted (i.e. displayed on a promotional page)?

allow_background.description: Does the group allow the assigned articles to be displayed with a background (i.e. displayed on a page with a deceptive/trivializing background)?

compared.description: Is the article's price compared to an offer from an other company?

credit_card.description: Credit card can be used for payments?

weekly_opening_days.description: Weekly opening days, exact opening plan for the week. Items are sorted for correct display.

closed.description: Is the store closed on this day?

statements.description: Statements for the current day. Items are sorted for correct display.

total_items.description: The number of items on all pages
The number of items on all pages

items.description: Articles data serialized for XPT.  (Not described in here)
Advertised article data serialized for XPT.  (Not described in here)

article_id.description: The unique identifier of an article

wine_year.description: Wine year for texts, when not defined the wine year sold in shop is used, -1 for wine year suppression in text

valid_on.description: Valid on (e.g. "2018-02-16") for prices, when not defined the current day is used

Filters: JSON array of Filter object, urlencoded.

Filter object:
- property: Property to filter on.
- operator: Operation property. Enumeration ('eq', 'like', 'lt', 'gt', 'in', ...). Dependent from property (not all might be allowed).
- type: Type of value. Enumeration ('string', 'integer', 'boolean', 'array') Dependent from property and operator (not all might be allowed).
- value: Value. Must be of the defined type.

Examples:

- [{"property":"in_shop","operator":"eq","type":"boolean","value":true}]
- [{"property":"channels","value":"vf-banner"},{"property":"week","value":12},{"property":"year","value":2023}]

- direction: (optional) Sort direction property. Enumeration ('asc', 'desc').

Examples:
